ygData.subject: The sparks return to their bodies...
ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantopulous stops near the area where the bodies of Time Warp, Inzola, and Stranato were laying. They were untouched all of that time. He raised his hands

------=_NextPart_000_056B_01C08679.6D8A0320
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Tarantopulous stops near the area where the bodies of Time Warp, Inzola, an=
d Stranato were laying. They were untouched all of that time. He raised his=
 hands and then dropped them. The sparks were naturally attaracted back to =
their original bodies. Thier sparks restored, the 3 stirred some. Tarantopu=
lous picked up Inzola and started back towards the Maximal base. Stranato, =
who was in better shape, woke up and scrambled to his feet.

Stranato: Wait=
!

Tarantopulous: Yes?

Stranato: Where are you taking my girlfriend?

Tara=
ntopulous: YOUR girlfriend? This is Inzola, she's married to Deemos.

Stran=
ato: She dumped that cad...for me.

Tarantopulous: For you? I don't believe=
 that.

He walked back towards the Maximal base, being followed slowly by S=
tranato, who complained bitterly along the way. Time Warp stirred and woke =
up. (Time Warp is now Alloran's, I relinquish control over him.)

Not too f=
ar away, Airbomber's spark was restored as well.

Airbomber: Who hit me? Ti=
me Warp, you ass! Where are you? Hey, Infectra, baby, where did you go?

At=
ma and Psuedo saprk's were put back into place. They wake up, they were dam=
aged pretty good, but were both really tough. (I also give these 2 to Allor=
an, and I relinquish them)

And finally, Clash's first victim, Plintissa's =
spark was restored to it's proper place. Plintissa woke up. She looked down=
 at the large hole in her chest where her spark had been torn out of place =
before. Plintissa was happy to be back to normal and in a way, alive again,=
 but also, she was back to a life of nothingness all over again. With that,=
 she headed towards the Maximal base...
